movies.title: Possessed
movies.plot: (Cantonese with English subtitles) Jim hosts a TV talk show on supernatural events. When his career is in jeopardy, he and ex-girlfriend Minako enlist the aid of Reverend Yeung to perform an exorcism on a schoolgirl in a desperate attempt to draw viewers. But soon they find out that the same ghost possessed a truck driver who slaughtered his whole family.
movies.simplePlot: (Cantonese with English subtitles) Jim hosts a TV talk show on supernatural events. When his career is in jeopardy, he and ex-girlfriend Minako enlist the aid of Reverend Yeung to perform ...

biography.bio: Conroy Chi-Chung Chan was born on November 30, 1972 in Hong Kong as Chi-Chung Chan. He is an actor and producer, known for The Heavenly Kings (2006), L'Expert de Hong Kong (2006) and Once a Gangster (2010). He has been married to Josie Ho since November 14, 2003.
biography.name: Conroy Chi-Chung Chan

biography.bio: Yoyo Chen was born on August 27, 1981 in Hong Kong. She is an actress, known for AV (2005), La vie sans principe (2011) and Can't Buy Me Love (2010). She has been married to Ho-shun Wong since October 11, 2011. They have one child.
biography.name: Yoyo Chen

biography.bio: Julian Cheung was born on August 27, 1971 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for B gai waak (1998), Bong ga (2007) and Chuet sik san tau (2001). He is married to Anita Yuen. They have one child.
biography.name: Julian Cheung

biography.bio: Although he remains one of Hong Kong's most bankable and well-regarded actors, Eddy Ko Hung's career - which began in 1967 at the Shaw Brothers studio - had already slowed and he was being cast in more secondary roles. He starred in a string of epics in the 1970s and became a household name after playing an iconic Chinese literary hero Lam Chung in the prime-time TVB series The Unyielding Master Lim in 1986. So rather than settling into obscurity after migrating to Vancouver, in Canada, with his family, Ko has found a new stage for himself in productions made outside Hong Kong. Having signed to a Canadian agent, Ko's international career began in 1998 with a role as an illegal immigrant in Lethal Weapon 4 (which also stars Jet Li). In addition to his frequent forays into Hong Kong cinema, his recent work has ranged from art-house fare such as Night Corridor to mainstream films and soap operas. His performance as folk hero Huo Yuanjia in an ATV series in 1995 won him a large following on the mainland, he has also starred in an Italian film ('of debatable quality,' murmurs Ko) and played a fictional Chinese head of state in a Canadian television series. His latest non-Chinese-language role is in French conspiracy thriller Largo Winch, in which he plays a tattooist who helps the film's titular hero (Tomer Sisley). When he first set foot in the studio, he could already speak English and Japanese, which has since helped him secure roles in international productions. The actor now splits his time between his Vancouver home, where he is a student of continuing education, and the mainland, where he acts and makes TV appearances. Careerwise, Hong Kong now seems very much an afterthought, although he drew TVB's ire three years ago by agreeing to appear in an ATV series about real-life crimes as a father who chopped his daughter's head off in a rage.
biography.name: Eddy Ko

biography.bio: Mary Kwan is an actress, known for Wang hang ba do (2002) and Possessed (2002).
biography.name: Mary Kwan

biography.bio: Suet Lam was born on July 8, 1964 in Tianjin, China. He is known for his work on Kung Fu Hustle (2004), PTU (2003) and Election (2005).
biography.name: Suet Lam

biography.bio: Sam Lee was born on September 27, 1975 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Made in Hong Kong (1997), Pinpon (2002) and Dog Bite Dog (2006).
biography.name: Sam Lee

biography.bio: Maju Ozawa was born on January 3, 1977 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Tokyo Raiders (2000), The Hirosaki Players (2010) and Playgirls 2012 - rensa yûkai satsujin wo abake! atsukute erokute yabai mehyôtachi (2012).
biography.name: Maju Ozawa

biography.bio: Kwan-Ho Tse was born on March 23, 1963 in Hong Kong, China. He is an actor, known for The Mad Phoenix (1997), Ordinary Heroes (1999) and The Miracle Box (2004).
biography.name: Kwan-Ho Tse
